attributes.title: trump killed my child
attributes.review: as soon as i opened the app i felt something inside me cramp. i had originally thought it was just my little bundle of joy causing a fuss, but when i had gone to my doctor for a routine check up, he said my baby had popped like an overblown balloon. my heart was/is utterly broken. my first child, a boy named barron (after our president). however, now that trump has murdered my child, i will no longer be supporting a killer.

attributes.title: Unnecessary Phone number
attributes.review: I really don’t like giving my number out often, I can’t stand it when apps force you to give your number in order to use it.
